description: A portfolio website that shows Ahromi's work as Frontend Enthusiast. This website build by Vue.js.
Web design for thesis web app Image classification. A UI design as guide to build the website
An Image classification web app using python as backend and html, css, & javascript as frontend. The website was built as final project to finish my degree at college.
category: Python, Tensorflow, Keras, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap

description: A data archiving web app for internal office of BAPPEDA Jawa Barat. Helping employees more easy to find an old letters, because the previous system is using paper based. I do collaborate with a friend to build the app.
The project was created in 2018, built using C++ and Unity. Basically this game is 2D Maze Game with a little modification and rules.
